name: Bloom and Doom
description:
Protect the Tree of Life using strategic plant placements.

Controls:

Click on your defensive towers in the menu to the right, bring them onto the stage and click again to place. 

Contributers:

-The Fruit and Vegetable Company-

https://itch.io/profile/beefcakecat

This game was made in the Global Game Jam 2022 between 28.01 and 31.01
